column1: Uchi////My only qualm would be with the wine selection
column2: which is slightly overpriced and not nearly as imaginative as the cuisine - do we really need Poema Cava
column3: offered per glass at the same price as it is per bottle at Specs
column4: on another wine list in this city? Even with that caveat
column5: Uchi will definitely be on my list for the next special occasion.
